1.0.name: wordpress/bangla-date
1.0.description:
**Update: Now automatically hooks the date and time functions. No need to edit any templates. To force output in Bengali, update the wordpress info properly, or edit the line 30 of bongabdo.php, and set the value of $beng_date_options['use bangla'] to 1 Convert English Dates to Bangla Dates, based on Dr. Muhammed Shahidullah's Bangla calendar approved by People's Republic of Bangladesh. Plugin autodetects the language, and displays Bangla / English version of the date. This program was written back in 2001 in qbasic. The month names were in English Later in 2003 it was ported to visual basic. I didn't know how to use unicode, and used bijoy scripts for it. As I learnt about wp plugin system more, i decided to port it to Wordpress. Now I have Bangla Unicode, and thus can use it. The plugin enables some functions that can be used to insert a bengali date, either in transliterated English, or in Bangla Unicode in anywhere of a wordpress blog.

These information were
